div.p: Value Set for Flag Category (Example). This value set defines category codes for Patient Record Flags. Patient record flags is a mechanism in which an alert can be assigned to patients who have certain high risk clinical needs or behavior problems. Flags can be configured to appear during the patient look-up process.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/flag-category

publisher.value: HL7 Clinical Quality Information (CQI) Work Group
